======================================

**Official Government Tender Announcement**

# Off-Road Motorcycle Training Services

## Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites qualified bidders to submit proposals for providing off-road motorcycle training services to deployed Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) members.

### Key Details

* **Tender Reference Number**: W6399-24LO31/A
* **Publication Date**: September 7, 2023
* **Bid Closing Date**: October 7, 2023, by 14:00 Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)

### Service Requirements

The successful bidder will provide off-road motorcycle training services to CAF members, focusing on operating motorcycles in adverse conditions, across various terrains, and in diverse weather conditions, both during the day and at night.

### Evaluation Criteria

Proposals will be evaluated based on lowest price.

### Submissions

Bidders must submit their proposals by email to:

[christopher.muldoon@forces.gc.ca](mailto:christopher.muldoon@forces.gc.ca)

### Additional Information

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Attachments

The tender notice includes the following attachments:

* [English language bid document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8848/02_w6399_24_lo31_rfso_offroad_motorcycle.engpdf.pdf)
* [French language bid document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8848/02_w6399_24_lo31_rfso_offroad_motorcycle_frn_0.pdf)
* [Amendment Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/12330/w6399_24lo31_off-road-motorcycle_amd001.pdf)

### Contact Information

For further information, please contact Christopher Muldoon at:

christopher.muldoon@forces.gc.ca
(613) 990-5234

### Notices

The notice URL for more information is not available.
